title: Is there a font similar to this???
content:
I'm really a newb when it comes to typography but I believe this typo is handwritten. Is there something out there remotely similar to "Kenichi"? And also what font is the city names in?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017073711im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kenichi_3512.png.jpg)
author: jwilliam85

comments.content:
The KENICHI lettering looks hand-drawn as you guessed, but you can find many similar styles by looking for childrens lettering fonts, or brush-drawn fonts.

The place names sans at the bottom is too small to see well, but the high M crotch is not too common. If you could describe the G it might be easier to guess some possibilities.

- Mike Yanega
